import React, {Component} from "react" import SelectFilter from './select' import toggleDecorator from './' import logo from '../logo.svg' import searchSign from '../search-sign.svg' class Header extends Component{ get SearchComp(){ if (!isOpen) return null return (
) } render(){ const { isOpen, handleClick} = this.props return(

FOR THE VOICE

1910-1920

FOR THE VOICE

AVANGARD RUSSIAN BOOK

ASSOCIATIONS, GROUPS AND PUBLISHING HOUSES

{this.SearchComp}
) } } export default toggleDecorator(Header)
